title: Strengthening Service Quality Practical Competencies: EFL (English) Learning Strategy Design Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate English reading and writing proficiency
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three strategies for structuring English writing using generative AI tools
Learners can recognize differences between AI feedback and human feedback and establish critical evaluation criteria
Learners can propose at least two approaches for utilizing AI tools in managing English learning time and organizing ideas
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
